metadata.synopsis: One liner when Nightsong lands in Ramazith's Tower balcony and charges to the center to face Lorroakan
metadata.how_to_trigger: After talking to Lorroakan, go to camp and let Nightsong know of the plot, making her go to Ramazith's. After aprox 10s, she should appear in 4991; 1; 704 saying this line.

0.speaker: Nightsong
0.text: Aha! I spy a wizard foul.
